summary: Makes food a lot more practical for healing purposes for all types of characters and adds some new foods and recipes. DOES NOT require any dlc.
descriptionHtml:
Meats heal your health and stamina
Fruits and vegetables heal your health and magicka.
Cheeses heal your stamina and magicka.
The amount of meat on most monster drops have been increased based on how big the monster is, and the new foods have been added into vendors inventory, enemy drops, and barrels like they were there from the start.

Cooked Meats from Mammoths heal for large amounts due to them coming from....well mammoths! Meat from Sabre Cats and Bears heal for a good amount while fish heals for a small amount due to how easy it is to acquire them.
Please give me feed back if you think that I need to balance any of the foods or if there is any issues!

Compatabilities:
Should be compatible with any mod as long as they don\'t change the heal value on foods.
NOT compatible with Real Needs and Diseases currently, I am hoping to come up with a solution for this in the future.
author: Wke113

files.name: Better Food Hearthfire
files.changelogHtml:
Changed esp name to match the mods title (original was just animal meat but this mod affects more than that.)
Added support for Hearthfire foods as well. (Except potato soup which I completely missed sorry)
I apologize for any inconvenience changing the name may have caused, don't worry this won't happen again.
